original_text: That is why we labor and strive, because we have put our hope in the living God, who is the Savior of all people, and especially of those who believe.
korean_text: 이를 위하여 우리가 수고하고 힘쓰는 것은 우리 소망을 살아 계신 하나님께 둠이니 곧 모든 사람 특히 믿는 자들의 구주시라

sentences.original_text: That is why we labor and strive
because we have put our hope in the living God
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 산 하나님께 소망을 두었기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: who is the Savior of all people
and especially of those who believe
